#summary An low-weight CMS
#labels framework,cms

= Introduction =

FrameWork is the easy to use website-editor you want to use as a webdesigner.
The package comes with buildin langauge and template support, and preloaded publishing modules (such as a WYSIWYG editor and a photo album).
